channel.title: Family Birthday Mom Humor Holidays on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Family Birthday Mom Humor Holidays on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: Week end.
item.description: I had a good weekend. I hung out all sorts of good friends and heard the downlow on everyones holiday. What a nice thing holidays are. I need another one so I don’t get so sleepy. ;) On saturday miriam and myself went to a rather humorous play called “cooking with elvis.” It was quite interesting and had some very funny moments - it was also slightly depressing.. about family dysfunction and the like.
